messages.title: Julian Sturdy - Conservatives Delivering For York Outer
messages.content: For 9 years I have been the Member of Parliament for York Outer, in which time I’ve worked with residents, volunteer groups & communities to achieve victories on the issues that matter locally.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Investing an extra £33.9 billion into the NHS. Helping improve your local hospital, doctors and GP surgeries.
Hiring 20,000 new police officers. More officers on the streets and tougher sentencing.
More funding for every pupil in every school. Ensuring our children get a better education.
Supporting the local economy and resolving traffic issues.

issues.economy: Supporting the local economy and resolving traffic issues.
issues.education: More funding for every pupil in every school. Ensuring our children get a better education.
issues.environment: Working with the Friends of New Earswick Swimming Pool to secure the pool’s long-term future.
issues.health: Investing an extra £33.9 billion into the NHS. Helping improve your local hospital, doctors and GP surgeries.
issues.lawCrime: Hiring 20,000 new police officers. More officers on the streets and tougher sentencing.
issues.transport: Government funding to dual York’s Outer Ring Road. Talking to Treasury ministers about bringing forward investment in York and getting traffic jams turned into positive action.

community.content: Engaged with local residents through public meetings, appointment surgeries, and social functions.
I’ve worked with residents, volunteer groups & communities to achieve victories on the issues that matter locally.

leaflet.personalStatement: For 9 years I have been the Member of Parliament for York Outer, in which time I’ve worked with residents, volunteer groups & communities to achieve victories on the issues that matter locally.

politicalExperience.role: Member of Parliament for York Outer
politicalExperience.achievements: Engaged with local residents through public meetings, appointment surgeries, social functions, and visiting schools. Successfully pushed for a Government fund to dual York’s Outer Ring Road.

images.caption: Local activists joined me in Haxby to launch my campaign. Lots of support for breaking the deadlock, delivering Brexit & getting on with the priorities we all share.
